thread.title: 'Scream Queens' Parodies Taylor Swift's Video in Halloween Promo
thread.title_full: 'Scream Queens' Parodies Taylor Swift's Video in Halloween Promo

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: 'Scream Queens' Parodies Taylor Swift's Video in Halloween Promo
text:
Comments Emma Roberts' Chanel Oberlin takes a leaf out of Taylor Swift's book and sends surprise gifts to her devotees. 
"Scream Queen" releases a promo video courtesy of Entertainment Weekly for the upcoming Halloween episode. In reminiscence of Taylor Swift 's Christmas gift-giving viral video, Emma Roberts ' Chanel Oberlin sends surprise presents to her loyal fans and even hands it out herself. 2015 was an amazing year for Chanel Oberlin and her 752 Instagram fans. Starting in early October, fans of Chanel would receive a Jack-O-Lantern emoji on their socials from Chanel. Parcels began to appear on their doorsteps in what became tenderly known as "Chanel-o-ween." "Scream Queens" will do not just one or two but three Halloween episodes. Lea Michele , Jamie Lee Curtis , Keke Palmer , Abigail Breslin , Oliver Hudson , Skyler Samuels , Nasim Pedrad, Chad Michael Murray , and Patrick Schwarzenegger are among the cast on the TV series.
